## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                            | Description |
| ----------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `--nv-body-color Color of the body`             |             |
| `--nv-body-font-family Font family of the body` |             |
| `--nv-body-font-size Font size of the body`     |             |
| `--nv-body-font-weight Font size of the body`   |             |
